    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandHandler

        protected CommandHandler(java.lang.String command,
                         java.lang.String description,
                         java.lang.String value,
                         CcddConstants.CommandLineType type,
                         int priority,
                         java.lang.Object[] conditions,
                         java.lang.String[] options,
                         java.util.List<CcddCommandLineHandler.CommandHandler> subArgument)
        Individual command line argument handler class constructor for commands with a fixed set of valid options
        Parameters:
        command - command name
        description - command description
        value - permissible values for this command
        type - command type: CommandLineType.NAME, CommandLineType.MINMAX, CommandLineType.SIZE, CommandLineType.COLOR, or CommandLineType.OPTION
        priority - order in which the command line argument should be executed relative to the other commands (a command with a lower priority number is executed prior to one with a higher number; commands with the same priority are executed in the order they appear on the command line
        conditions - array of output parameters associated with each input option
        options - array of valid input options
        subArgument - List of this commands sub-argument definitions

      • CommandHandler

        protected CommandHandler(java.lang.String command,
                         java.lang.String description,
                         java.lang.String value,
                         CcddConstants.CommandLineType type,
                         int priority,
                         java.lang.Object[] conditions,
                         java.lang.String[] options)
        Individual command line argument handler class constructor for commands with a fixed set of valid options
        Parameters:
        command - command name
        description - command description
        value - permissible values for this command
        type - command type: CommandLineType.NAME, CommandLineType.MINMAX, CommandLineType.SIZE, CommandLineType.COLOR, or CommandLineType.OPTION
        priority - order in which the command line argument should be executed relative to the other commands (a command with a lower priority number is executed prior to one with a higher number; commands with the same priority are executed in the order they appear on the command line
        conditions - array of output parameters associated with each input option
        options - array of valid input options

        command - command name
        description - command description
        value - permissible values for this command
        type - command type: CmdType.NAME, or CmdType.COLOR
        priority - order in which the command line argument should be executed relative to the other commands (a command with a lower priority number is executed prior to one with a higher number; commands with the same priority are executed in the order they appear on the command line
        subArguments - List of this commands sub-argument definitions

      • CommandHandler

        protected CommandHandler(java.lang.String command,
                         java.lang.String description,
                         java.lang.String value,
                         CcddConstants.CommandLineType type,
                         int priority,
                         java.lang.Object[] conditions)
        Individual command line argument handler class constructor for commands with value limits
        Parameters:
        command - command name
        description - command description
        value - permissible values for this command
        type - command type: CmdType.MINMAX or CmdType.SIZE
        priority - order in which the command line argument should be executed relative to the other commands (a command with a lower priority number is executed prior to one with a higher number; commands with the same priority are executed in the order they appear on the command line
        conditions - array of limit values

    • Method Detail

        protected boolean hasArgument()
        Check if the command requires an argument
        Returns:
        true if the command requires an argument

        protected java.util.List<CcddCommandLineHandler.CommandHandler> getSubArgument()
        Get the list of sub-arguments for this command
        Returns:
        List of sub-arguments for this command; null if the command has no sub-arguments

        Parameters:

        Throws:
